snippet: The moved appeared to reflect a somber assessment of the country’s prospects, even as warring factions were said to have opened preliminary talks.
lead_paragraph: The moved appeared to reflect a somber assessment of the country’s prospects, even as warring factions were said to have opened preliminary talks.

headline.main: U.S. Orders Evacuation of Staff Members From Embassy in South Sudan
headline.print_headline: U.S. Orders Evacuation of Staff Members From Embassy in South Sudan
